channel.title: 718/754 - RuneAzura 718 - Full screen and HD
channel.description:
[center][IMG]http://img138.imageshack.us/img138/5167/n1z.gif[/img] ★WEBSITE★ [url=http://RuneAzura.com/718]http://RuneAzura.com/718[/url] ★DOWNLOAD★ [url=http://runeazura.com/718/RuneAzura718.jar]http://runeazura.com/718/RuneAzura718.jar[/url] ★VOTING★ [url=http://runeazura.com/718/vote]http://runeazura.com/718/vote[/url]
RuneAzura 718 is a brand new addition too the RuneAzura team. We currently have two servers as of last week, RuneAzura 317 was our original project and has been up for just under a year, with continuous updates. The RuneAzura team slowly came too the conclusion, "why not expand our services for the majority of Rsps players?" Therefore, we thought a great 718 would do just the trick bringing out all the new 718 features and content that we can not explore on the 317. [/center]
[*]Amazing 718 HD and full screen compatability. [*]Easy navigation with a user friendly teleports. [*]10+ Bosses with strong Economic Drop Rates, Teaming bosses is available! [*]Lots to do - You will never get bored with on-going boss "contracts" and a Prestige system! [*]Four levels of difficulty - Super Easy, Easy, Normal, Hard and Extreme. [*]Unique Donator and Server ranks - V.I.P Donator, Legendary Donator, Ultimate Donator, GFX Designer and Server Helper. [*]Unique Polypore and Jadikino lairs. [*]Fully Working QBD. [*]Flawless Matrix Switching. [*]Great economic PVM with realistic drop rates. [*]Fully working dungeoneering - Easy, Medium, High and [New] Daemonheim. [*]Fully working SOF, Squeal Of Fortune with realistic rates.
Many more amazing features too come in the near feature. Check RuneAzura 718 in game for more in-depth detail.
[spoiler=IMAGES]Images of in-game content. [center]HD quality - Unique Bosses. [img]http://img853.imageshack.us/img853/2376/bv7k.png[/img] [center]Fully Working Dungeoneering at Daemonheim.[/center] [img]http://img19.imageshack.us/img19/4416/5ao9.png[/img] Polypore Dungeon. [img]http://img191.imageshack.us/img191/6697/cx7t.png[/img] Jadikino lair. [img]http://img706.imageshack.us/img706/324/hu7x.png[/img][/center] [center]Fight Caves. [img]http://img801.imageshack.us/img801/4132/1yks.png[/img][/center][/spoiler]
*Please note: This is only a small advertisement due to the fact that the server is brand new, we are still in beta/development. We need active players and potential staff members, Join our team today!*

item.title: 718/754 - RuneAzura 718 - Full screen and HD
item.dc:creator: @Xhyst Xhyst
item.description:
@Xhyst wrote:

Amazing server with a very active community. Ever since my first day with RuneAzura on the 317, Brad and Dylan have released so much content it was unbelievable. Now, they have this 718 as well as the 317, and they are still uploading amazing content on both at the same time. RuneAzura is an amazing server.

Read full topic

item.title: 718/754 - RuneAzura 718 - Full screen and HD
item.dc:creator: @Zs_agent Zs agent
item.description:
@Zs_agent wrote:

very fun and exciting server. 1st day blew my mind away. Been with them for months now and well it just gets better. i vouch for this server and highly suggest you to give it a try.Has lots of great features and customs. not too much tho But still worth trying. Some actually learn new things they could not try on the 317. So go ahead! hope to see you all ingame!

Read full topic
